property.value: A symbol of hope for hopeless times.

property.value: Matthew D. Wilson

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Solitary Confinement unless you discard a card. Skip your draw step. You have shroud. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you.

property.value: Scott M. Fischer

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our unity humbles our foes."

property.name: Artist
property.value: Ron Spears

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our forebears once flew like this - carefree, needing nothing but a warm nest and a full belly. Our intellect may be more burden than blessing." - Commander Eesha

property.value: Heather Hudson

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.

property.name: Flavor

You can't exile Flash of Insight to pay for its own flashback cost.)

property.value: Ben Thompson

property.value: "I see their moral dilemmas. I see their raw courage. I see their self-sacrifice. I see our victory."

property.value: Mark Tedin
